External Libraries:
=============================================================================

bzip2
--------------------

Archive:    bzip2-1.0.5.tar.gz
Source:     http://www.bzip.org/downloads.html.


openssl
--------------------

Arhive:     OpenSSL files installed by Win32OpenSSL-0_9_8k.exe.
Source:     http://www.slproweb.com/products/Win32OpenSSL.html


ziplib
--------------------

Archive:    zlib123.zip.
Source:     http://www.zlib.net/
